metadata.title: CVE-2019-3888 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Undertow web server before 2.0.21. An information exposure of plain text credentials through log files because Connectors.executeRootHandler:402 logs the HttpServerExchange object at ERROR level using UndertowLogger.REQUEST_LOGGER.undertowRequestFailed(t, exchange)

criterions.comment: undertow package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.23-1').
